alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Johnson County Higher Elevations; Pope County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Southern Pope County; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 17 at 3:28AM CDT until October 19 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM CDT TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible. * WHERE...Conway, Faulkner, White, Woodruff, Southern Johnson County, Southern Pope County, Johnson County Higher Elevations and Pope County Higher Elevations Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 10 AM CDT Tuesday. For the Freeze Watch, from Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS: A Freeze Warning means sub-freezing temperatures are imminent or highly likely. These conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
